title: Mac and Linux support for daemon and scripts
description:
Make daemon and tooling work seamlessly on Mac and Linux.

**Current state:** Windows-focused (PowerShell scripts, Windows paths)

**Required:**
- Shell scripts (bash) alternatives to PowerShell scripts
- Cross-platform path handling in daemon
- Mac-specific Node.js resolution
- Linux systemd service file (optional)
- Homebrew formula for Mac installation
- Test on Mac (Intel + Apple Silicon) and Linux (Ubuntu)
taskRails: Test on real Mac hardware or CI
